description: Yuri, also known as Yurippe, is a girl with a determined personality who is attending the afterlife school, where she meets http://anidb.net/ch12094 [Otonashi] and invites him to join the SSS — http://anidb.net/ch15364 [Shinda Sekai Sensen] — an organization she leads which fights against God. She carries a silver Beretta 92.
name: Nakamura Yuri
